suite_id.description: The ID of the test suite for the test run(s) (required)

name.description: The name of the test run(s)

description.description: The description of the test run(s) (requires TestRail 5.2 or later)

assignedto_id.description: The ID of the user the test run(s) should be assigned to

include_all.description: True for including all test cases of the test suite and false for a custom case selection (default: true)

case_ids.description: An array of case IDs for the custom case selection

items.description: case ID for the custom case selection

config_ids.description: An array of configuration IDs used for the test runs of the test plan entry (requires TestRail 3.1 or later)

runs.description: An array of test runs with configurations, please see the example below for details (requires TestRail 3.1 or later)
